title: Why Budgets Are Outdated and Restrictive
subtitle: Discover a more effective approach to managing your finances with a cash flow system.
content:
Why Budgets Are Outdated and Restrictive

I'm Tyler, a former financial advisor and portfolio manager. If this is helpful, check out my new podcast, Your Money Guide on the Side, by clicking the link in my bio.

1. Budgets Feel Like Diets

Budgets make people feel like they're on a diet. Just like diets, most of them collapse in a fit of guilt and Taco Bell.

2. Design a Cash Flow System

What actually works is designing a cash flow system. Automate your priorities, set spending ceilings, and let the rest be frictionless.

3. Avoiding Moral Failures

When you treat every purchase like a moral failure, you will burn out quickly. A real system builds in joy and margin, so stop budgeting. Instead, build a system that supports your life rather than policing it.
